metadata.Title: CVE-2019-18886 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in Symfony 4.2.0 to 4.2.11 and 4.3.0 to 4.3.7. The ability to enumerate users was possible due to different handling depending on whether the user existed when making unauthorized attempts to use the switch users functionality. This is related to symfony/security.

criterions.comment: symfony package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.3.8+dfsg-1ubuntu1').
